title: Adding or deleting stat. holidays in a batch
content: You can add stat. holidays to everyone for one or more days. For more information on stat. holidays, click here.Click on the Employees tab,Choose Add or Delete Stat. Holidays (Batch),Select the employees: by Enterprises, OR Service, Department, OR by names,The Stat. holidays will be added for the following dates button is checked by default,If you want to delete all the stats. holidays that are currently in your employees' schedule, check the other box If stat. Holidays exist for the specified date it will be deleted.Choose the date(s) with the calendar then click on Search,Check the employees concerned,Click Save.Notes:Â The delete stat. holidays batch tool will not delete other types of shifts for the same day, even if they are not published.The added stat. holidays batch will be visible to the employee once registered.You can batch add holidays in the past, which in turn will create timesheets for approval. If the holiday falls on a date after the previous pay period, you cannot approve them.Helpful?00Updated: 1 year ago Share :
